subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty?
question_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Bapa Rawal was the founder of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty.
explanation_hi: बापा रावल गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following was a major achievement of the Pratihar dynasty?
question_hi: प्रतिहार वंश का एक प्रमुख उपलब्धि कौनसी थी?
A_en: Establishment of the city of Kanauj
B_en: Development of the city of Delhi
explanation_en: The Pratihar dynasty established the city of Kanauj.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहार वंश ने कानौज शहर की स्थापना की।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the leader of the Chauhan dynasty during the Second Battle of Tarain?
question_hi: चौहान वंश के नेता द्वितीय तराई की लड़ाई के दौरान कौन थे?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was the leader of the Chauhan dynasty during the Second Battle of Tarain.
explanation_hi: पृथ्वीराज चौहान द्वितीय तराई की लड़ाई के दौरान चौहान वंश के नेता थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following dynasties was known for its bravery and military prowess?
question_hi: जो वंश उनकी बहादुरी और सैन्य शक्ति के लिए प्रसिद्ध था?
explanation_en: All of the above dynasties were known for their bravery and military prowess.
explanation_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया, प्रतिहार और चौहान सभी वंशों की बहादुरी और सैन्य शक्ति के लिए प्रसिद्ध थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who built the iconic Kumbhalgarh Fort?
question_hi: कुंभलगढ़ किले का निर्माण किसने किया?
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha built the iconic Kumbhalgarh Fort.
explanation_hi: राणा कुम्भा ने कुंभलगढ़ किले का निर्माण किया।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following was a major contribution of the Pratihar dynasty to Indian history?
question_hi: प्रतिहार वंश ने भारतीय इतिहास में क्या मुख्य योगदान दिया?
D_en: Building of the temples at Khajuraho
explanation_en: The Pratihar dynasty built the temples at Khajuraho, which is a major contribution to Indian history.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहार वंश ने खजुराहो में मंदिरों का निर्माण किया, जो भारतीय इतिहास में एक प्रमुख योगदान है।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the ruler of the Chauhan dynasty during the First Battle of Tarain?
question_hi: चौहान वंश का शासक प्रथम तराई की लड़ाई के दौरान कौन था?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was the ruler of the Chauhan dynasty during the First Battle of Tarain.
explanation_hi: पृथ्वीराज चौहान प्रथम तराई की लड़ाई के दौरान चौहान वंश का शासक था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following dynasties was known for its literary and cultural achievements?
question_hi: जो वंश उनकी साहित्यिक और सांस्कृतिक उपलब्धियों के लिए प्रसिद्ध था?
explanation_en: The Guhil-Sisodia dynasty was known for its literary and cultural achievements.
explanation_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश उनकी साहित्यिक और सांस्कृतिक उपलब्धियों के लिए प्रसिद्ध था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the leader of the Chauhan dynasty during the Third Battle of Tarain?
question_hi: चौहान वंश के नेता तृतीय तराई की लड़ाई के दौरान कौन थे?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was the leader of the Chauhan dynasty during the Third Battle of Tarain.
explanation_hi: पृथ्वीराज चौहान तृतीय तराई की लड़ाई के दौरान चौहान वंश के नेता थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following was a major contribution of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty to the history of Rajasthan?
question_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश ने राजस्थान के इतिहास में क्या मुख्य योगदान दिया?
A_en: Establishment of the city of Mewar
D_en: Building of the temples at Chittor
explanation_en: The Guhil-Sisodia dynasty built the temples at Chittor, which is a major contribution to the history of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश ने चित्तौड़गढ़ में मंदिरों का निर्माण किया, जो राजस्थान के इतिहास में एक प्रमुख योगदान है।
